title: Old Anatomical Drawings - fonts?
content:
Any ideas on fonts that would be reminiscent of old anatomical drawings? I’m thinking of anything like these:

[http://tinyurl.com/32an6p](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212553/http:/tinyurl.com/32an6p "http://tinyurl.com/32an6p")  
 [http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/46/Gray492.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212553/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/46/Gray492.png "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/46/Gray492.png")

I’ll take any suggestions for other types that might work since I’m in a pinch.

Thanks,  
Marc

 [‹ Minimöbl Montage-anleitungen monospaced tech sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39439 "Go to previous forum topic") [Maybe Brush Script? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39529 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mpsyp

comments.content:
ITC Century Light Italic

Fastest thing I could think of.
